original_text: The people of all other nations who see this will ask, ‘Why has the Lord destroyed this land? Why was he so angry with the people who lived there?’
korean_text: 여러 나라 사람들도 묻기를 여호와께서 어찌하여 이 땅에 이같이 행하셨느냐 이같이 크고 맹렬하게 노하심은 무슨 뜻이냐 하면

sentences.original_text: The people of all other nations who see this
sentences.korean_translation: 이것을 보는 다른 모든 나라의 사람들이

sentences.original_text: Why has the Lord destroyed this land?
with the people who lived there?
